thread.section_title: FlightHub Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of FlightHub | flighthub.com
thread.title: Phillipina

author: Phillipina
title: Phillipina
text:
I thank Flight hub for making things possible. I have a wedding to attend
in Toronto that weekend and went to look for affordable fair as things are
in process. lol. financially. Going through a divorce. So that I got
a ticket for just over $400 from Edmonton, excited me! And I booked it.
However, when I got my electronic ticket and saw the airport name,
only then it dawned on me its not in Toronto and Im flying to Hamilton.
So the down side is when I searched flights to Toronto, and the fact that I don't know Ontario at all, made an error myself. Hope I can resolve it. They seem like a wonderful company and I would recommend them to anyone.
Perhaps if I get the credit for this review, I can change my ticket without switching fees.
